localised_descriptions.I: Il nemico è travolto da un potente getto d’acqua.
localised_descriptions.S: Lanza agua a chorros para atacar.

localised_descriptions.D: Eine riesige Welle bricht über den Gegner herein.
localised_descriptions.E: Creates a huge wave, then crashes it down on the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Crée une énorme vague qui s’écrase sur l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Un’onda enorme si abbatte sul nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Crea una ola enorme y se la lanza al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Gegner wird von Eisstrahl getroffen, friert evtl. ein.
localised_descriptions.E: Blasts the foe with an icy beam that may freeze it.
localised_descriptions.F: Envoie un rayon de glace pouvant geler l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Un raggio gelido che può congelare il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Rayo de hielo que puede llegar a congelar.

localised_descriptions.D: Ein Schneesturm, der den Gegner einfrieren kann.
localised_descriptions.E: Hits the foe with an icy storm that may freeze it.
localised_descriptions.F: Déclenche une tempête pouvant geler l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Una tempesta di ghiaccio che può congelare il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Tormenta de hielo que puede llegar a congelar.

localised_descriptions.D: Feuert einen Strahl ab, der Gegner verwirren kann.
localised_descriptions.E: Fires a peculiar ray that may confuse the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Etrange rayon pouvant rendre l’ennemi confus.
localised_descriptions.I: Un raggio speciale che può confondere il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Extraño rayo que puede causar confusión.

localised_descriptions.D: Versprüht Blasen, die den INIT.-Wert evtl. senken.
localised_descriptions.E: Forcefully sprays bubbles that may lower SPEED.
localised_descriptions.F: Envoie des bulles pouvant baisser la VITESSE.
localised_descriptions.I: Forte getto di bolle che può ridurre la VELOCITÀ.
localised_descriptions.S: Diluvio de burbujas que puede bajar la VELOCIDAD.

localised_descriptions.D: Regenbogenfarbener Strahl, senkt evtl. ANGR.-Wert.
localised_descriptions.E: Fires a rainbow-colored beam that may lower ATTACK.
localised_descriptions.F: Envoie un rayon arc-en-ciel pouvant baisser l’ATTAQUE.
localised_descriptions.I: Un raggio color dell’iride che può ridurre l’ATTACCO.
localised_descriptions.S: Rayo multicolor que puede reducir el ATAQUE.

localised_descriptions.D: Starke Attacke. Angreifer setzt eine Runde aus.
localised_descriptions.E: Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.
localised_descriptions.F: Puissant, mais immobilise le lanceur pour un tour.
localised_descriptions.I: È potente, ma chi la usa perde il turno successivo.
localised_descriptions.S: Es eficaz, pero deja inmóvil al atacante 1 turno.

localised_descriptions.D: Greift Gegner mit dem Schnabel an.
localised_descriptions.E: Attacks the foe with a jabbing beak, etc.
localised_descriptions.F: Attaque l’ennemi avec un bec pointu, etc.
localised_descriptions.I: Il nemico è colpito da una beccata o un colpo simile.
localised_descriptions.S: Ataca con un punzante pico.

localised_descriptions.D: Attacke, bei der der Schna-bel als Bohrer dient.
localised_descriptions.E: A corkscrewing attack with the beak acting as a drill.
localised_descriptions.F: Une attaque utilisant le bec comme une perceuse.
localised_descriptions.I: Attacco a spirale con un becco trapanante.
localised_descriptions.S: Picotazo giratorio y perforador muy potente.

localised_descriptions.D: Rücksichtsloser Rempler.  Schädigt auch Angreifer.
localised_descriptions.E: A reckless body slam that also hurts the user.
localised_descriptions.F: Une charge violente qui blesse aussi le lanceur.
localised_descriptions.I: Carica spericolata che danneggia anche chi la fa.
localised_descriptions.S: Golpe desmedido que también hiere al agresor.

localised_descriptions.D: Tritt, der massigen Gegnern mehr Schaden zufügt.
localised_descriptions.E: A kick that inflicts more damage on heavier foes.
localised_descriptions.F: Un coup de pied faisant plus mal aux ennemis lourds.
localised_descriptions.I: Un calcio che danneggia i nemici più pesanti.
localised_descriptions.S: Cuanto más pesa el enemigo, más daño causa.

localised_descriptions.D: Kontert physischen Tref-fer mit doppelter Kraft.
localised_descriptions.E: Retaliates any physical hit with double the power.
localised_descriptions.F: Renvoie toute attaque physique 2 fois plus fort.
localised_descriptions.I: Replica agli attacchi fisici con forza raddoppiata.
localised_descriptions.S: Devuelve un golpe físico por duplicado.

localised_descriptions.D: Richtet Schaden gemäß Level d. Angreifers an.
localised_descriptions.E: Inflicts damage identical to the user’s level.
localised_descriptions.F: Inflige des dégâts selon le niveau du lanceur.
localised_descriptions.I: Infligge un danno pari al livello di chi la usa.
localised_descriptions.S: Resta los mismos PS que nivel tenga el agresor.

localised_descriptions.D: Erzeugt enorme Kraft und rammt den Gegner.
localised_descriptions.E: Builds enormous power, then slams the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Accumule de la puissance, puis frappe l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Raccoglie un’enorme energia per poi colpire il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Potente ataque físico.

localised_descriptions.D: Attacke, die die Hälfte des Schadens absorbiert.
localised_descriptions.E: An attack that absorbs half the damage inflicted.
localised_descriptions.F: Une attaque absorbant la moitié des dégâts infligés.
localised_descriptions.I: Assorbe metà dei PS sottratti al nemico.

localised_descriptions.D: Gegner wird bepflanzt und verliert jede Runde KP.
localised_descriptions.E: Plants a seed on the foe to steal HP on every turn.
localised_descriptions.F: Plante des graines pour voler des PV à chaque tour.
localised_descriptions.I: Semi piantati sul nemico gli sottraggono PS ogni turno.
localised_descriptions.S: Planta tres semillas que quitan PS en cada turno.

localised_descriptions.D: Der Körper wächst und SPEZ. ANGR. wird erhöht.
localised_descriptions.E: Forces the body to grow and heightens SP. ATK.
localised_descriptions.F: Développe le corps et augmente l’ATQ. SPE.
localised_descriptions.I: Provoca la crescita del corpo e aumenta l’ATT. SP.
localised_descriptions.S: Crece a marchas forzadas y aumenta el AT. ESP.

localised_descriptions.D: Trifft Gegner mit Blättern. Hohe Volltrefferquote.
localised_descriptions.E: Cuts the enemy with leaves. High critical-hit ratio.
localised_descriptions.F: Tranche avec des feuilles. Taux de critiques élevé.
localised_descriptions.I: Foglie tagliano il nemico. Probabile brutto colpo.
localised_descriptions.S: Corta con hojas. Suele ser crítico.

localised_descriptions.D: Absorbiert Licht in der 1. Runde, 2. Runde Angriff.
localised_descriptions.E: Absorbs light in one turn, then attacks next turn.
localised_descriptions.F: Absorbe la lumière et attaque le tour suivant.
localised_descriptions.I: Al primo turno assorbe luce e attacca nel successivo.
localised_descriptions.S: 1.ᵉ turno: absorbe luz. 2.º: ataca.

localised_descriptions.D: Verstreut giftigen Puder, der Gegner vergiften kann.
localised_descriptions.E: Scatters a toxic powder that may poison the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Répand une poudre toxique pouvant empoisonner.
localised_descriptions.I: Polvere tossica che può avvelenare il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Polvo tóxico que puede envenenar al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Verstreut Puder, der den Gegner evtl. paralysiert.
localised_descriptions.E: Scatters a powder that may paralyze the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Répand une poudre pouvant paralyser l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Polvere che può paralizzare il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Esparce polvo que puede paralizar al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Verstreut Puder, der Geg. evtl. in Schlaf versetzt.
localised_descriptions.E: Scatters a powder that may cause the foe to sleep.
localised_descriptions.F: Répand une poudre pouvant endormir l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Polvere che può far addormentare il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Esparce polvo que puede dormir al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Angriff über 2-3 Runden. Angreifer wird verwirrt.
localised_descriptions.E: A rampage of 2 to 3 turns that confuses the user.
localised_descriptions.F: Une attaque furieuse de 2 à 3 tours. Lanceur confus.
localised_descriptions.I: Attacco veemente di 2-3 turni: confonde chi lo usa.
localised_descriptions.S: Dura de 2 a 3 turnos y acaba confundiéndote.

localised_descriptions.D: Umwickelt Gegner mit Faden und senkt INIT.-Wert.
localised_descriptions.E: Binds the foe with string to reduce its SPEED.
localised_descriptions.F: Ligote l’ennemi afin de réduire sa VITESSE.
localised_descriptions.I: Un filo avvolge il nemico riducendone la VELOCITÀ.
localised_descriptions.S: Baja la VELOCIDAD del enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Stößt Schockwellen aus, die 40 KP Schaden anrichten.
localised_descriptions.E: Launches shock waves that always inflict 40 HP damage.
localised_descriptions.F: Envoie des ondes de choc infligeant 40 PV de dégâts.
localised_descriptions.I: Fiammate che causano sempre un danno di 40 PS.
localised_descriptions.S: Cadena de ondas de choque que quitan 40 PS.

localised_descriptions.D: Schließt Gegner für 2-5 Runden in Feuerkreis ein.
localised_descriptions.E: Traps the foe in a ring of fire for 2 to 5 turns.
localised_descriptions.F: Encercle l’ennemi de flammes pendant 2 à 5 tours.
localised_descriptions.I: Un turbine di fuoco avvolge il nemico da 2 a 5 turni.
localised_descriptions.S: Un aro de fuego que atrapa de 2 a 5 veces.

localised_descriptions.D: Elektro-Attacke. Gegner evtl. paralysiert.
localised_descriptions.E: An electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Une attaque électrique pouvant paralyser l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Attacco elettrico che può paralizzare il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Ataque eléctrico que puede paralizar al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Starke Elektro-Attacke, Gegner evtl. paralysiert.
localised_descriptions.E: A strong electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Forte attaque électrique pouvant paralyser l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Potente attacco elettrico: può paralizzare il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Duro ataque eléctrico que puede paralizar al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Ein schwacher Stromstoß, der den Gegner paralysiert.
localised_descriptions.E: A weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Un faible choc électrique qui paralyse l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Debole scarica elettrica che paralizza il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Una descarga que puede paralizar al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Elektro-Attacke, die den Gegner evtl. paralysiert.
localised_descriptions.E: A lightning attack that may cause paralysis.
localised_descriptions.F: Une attaque foudroyante pouvant paralyser l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Un tuono che può causare paralisi.
localised_descriptions.S: Un estruendo que puede paralizar al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Wirft kleine Steine auf den Gegner.
localised_descriptions.E: Throws small rocks to strike the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Envoie des cailloux pour frapper l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Il nemico è colpito da piccole rocce.
localised_descriptions.S: Tira pequeñas rocas al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Mächtiges Beben. Ist bei fliegenden Feinden nutzlos.
localised_descriptions.E: A powerful quake, but has no effect on flying foes.
localised_descriptions.F: Secousse sans effet sur les adversaires volants.
localised_descriptions.I: Potente sisma, che non ha effetto sui nemici volanti.
localised_descriptions.J: ▶iす zi  ji  iす  す                öよふくCをふくeぅふくどゅふくゅらふくmをふくどぇふくダゅふく
localised_descriptions.S: Fuerte, pero inútil contra voladores.

localised_descriptions.D: Sofort-K.O. Wirft Gegner in Gebirgsspalte.
localised_descriptions.E: A one-hit KO move that drops the foe in a fissure.
localised_descriptions.F: Fait tomber l’ennemi dans une crevasse et le met K.O.
localised_descriptions.I: Mossa da KO in un attacco: getta in un abisso.
localised_descriptions.S: Ataque de tierra. Fulmina en 1 golpe.

localised_descriptions.D: Gräbt sich in der 1. Runde ein und trifft in der 2.
localised_descriptions.E: Digs underground the first turn and strikes next turn.
localised_descriptions.F: Creuse sous terre au 1ᵉ tour et frappe au 2ᵉ.
localised_descriptions.I: Al primo turno scava, per attaccare al secondo.
localised_descriptions.S: 1.ᵉ turno: cava. 2.º: ataca.

localised_descriptions.D: Vergiftet den Gegner mit  einem starken Toxin.
localised_descriptions.E: Poisons the foe with an intensifying toxin.
localised_descriptions.F: Empoisonne l’ennemi avec une puissante toxine.
localised_descriptions.I: Avvelena il nemico con una potente tossina.
localised_descriptions.J: ⬆い ⬆う
localised_descriptions.S: Envenena al rival de forma progresiva.

localised_descriptions.D: Psycho-Attacke, die den Gegner evtl. verwirrt.
localised_descriptions.E: A psychic attack that may cause confusion.
localised_descriptions.F: Une attaque PSY pouvant rendre l’ennemi confus.
localised_descriptions.I: Attacco psichico che può causare confusione.
localised_descriptions.S: Ataque psíquico que puede causar confusión.

localised_descriptions.D: Starke Psycho-Attacke, die evtl. SPEZ. VERT. senkt.
localised_descriptions.E: A powerful psychic attack that may lower SP. DEF.
localised_descriptions.F: Une puissante attaque PSY pouvant baisser la DEF. SPE.
localised_descriptions.I: Potente attacco psichico: può ridurre la DIF. SP.
localised_descriptions.S: Fuerte ataque psíquico que puede bajar la DEF. ESP.

localised_descriptions.D: Hypno-Attacke, die Gegner evtl. in Schlaf versetzt.
localised_descriptions.E: A hypnotizing move that may induce sleep.
localised_descriptions.F: Une attaque hypnotique pouvant endormir l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Mossa ipnotizzante che può far addormentare il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Ataque hipnótico que puede dormir al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Friedliche Meditation, um ANGR.-Wert zu steigern.
localised_descriptions.E: Meditates in a peaceful fashion to raise ATTACK.
localised_descriptions.F: Méditation pacifique pour augmenter l’ATTAQUE.
localised_descriptions.I: Chi la usa medita per migliorare l’ATTACCO.
localised_descriptions.J: ィ え
localised_descriptions.S: Reposa y medita para aumentar el ATAQUE.

localised_descriptions.D: Entspannt den Körper, um INIT.-Wert. zu steigern.
localised_descriptions.E: Relaxes the body to sharply boost SPEED.
localised_descriptions.F: Relaxation du corps pour booster la VITESSE.
localised_descriptions.I: Il corpo si rilassa e sale di molto la VELOCITÀ.
localised_descriptions.S: Relaja el cuerpo para ganar VELOCIDAD.

localised_descriptions.D: Sehr schneller Angriff mit Erstschlaggarantie.
localised_descriptions.E: An extremely fast attack that always strikes first.
localised_descriptions.F: Attaque fulgurante qui permet de frapper d’abord.
localised_descriptions.I: Attacco rapidissimo che colpisce sempre per primo.
localised_descriptions.S: Ataque rápido que permite golpear en 1.ᵉ lugar.

localised_descriptions.D: Erhöht ANGR. des Anwenders bei jedem gegn. Treffer.
localised_descriptions.E: Raises the user’s ATTACK every time it is hit.
localised_descriptions.F: Augmente l’ATTAQUE du lanceur à chaque coup reçu.
localised_descriptions.I: Sale ATTACCO di chi la usa ogni volta che è colpito.
localised_descriptions.S: Mejora tu ATAQUE cada vez que te golpean.

localised_descriptions.D: Psycho-Angriff, um sofort aus einem Kampf zu fliehen.
localised_descriptions.E: A psychic move for fleeing from battle instantly.
localised_descriptions.F: Capacité PSY permettant de prendre aussitôt la fuite.
localised_descriptions.I: Mossa psichica per fuggire immediatamente dalla lotta.
localised_descriptions.S: Movimiento psíquico que permite huir al instante.

localised_descriptions.D: Richtet Schaden gemäß Level d. Angreifers an.
localised_descriptions.E: Inflicts damage identical to the user’s level.
localised_descriptions.F: Inflige des dégâts selon le niveau du lanceur.
localised_descriptions.I: Infligge un danno pari al livello di chi la usa.
localised_descriptions.S: Se restarán tantos PS como nivel tenga el agresor.

localised_descriptions.D: Kopiert eine zuvor ausge-führte Attacke d. Gegners.
localised_descriptions.E: Copies a move used by the foe during one battle.
localised_descriptions.F: Imite une des attaques utilisées par l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Copia una delle mosse usate dal nemico durante la lotta.
localised_descriptions.S: Copia un ataque usado por el enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Stößt einen Schrei aus, um gegn. VERT. zu senken.
localised_descriptions.E: Emits a screech to sharply reduce the foe’s DEFENSE.
localised_descriptions.F: Cri strident qui baisse la DEFENSE ennemie.
localised_descriptions.I: Stridio che riduce di molto  la DIFESA del nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Ruido agudo que baja mucho la DEFENSA del rival.

localised_descriptions.D: Erzeugt Ebenbilder, um  Fluchtwert zu erhöhen.
localised_descriptions.E: Creates illusory copies to raise evasiveness.
localised_descriptions.F: Crée des images-miroirs pour augmenter l’esquive.
localised_descriptions.I: Copie illusorie aumentano la capacità di elusione.
localised_descriptions.S: Crea espejismos para  mejorar la EVASIÓN.

localised_descriptions.D: Max. KP des Anwenders w. bis zur Hälfte aufgefüllt.
localised_descriptions.E: Recovers up to half the user’s maximum HP.
localised_descriptions.F: Regagne jusqu’à la moitié des PV max du lanceur.
localised_descriptions.I: Chi la usa recupera fino a metà dei PS massimi.
localised_descriptions.S: Restaura hasta la mitad de los PS máximos.

localised_descriptions.D: Stärkt die Muskulatur und erhöht VERT.-Wert.
localised_descriptions.E: Stiffens the body’s  muscles to raise DEFENSE.
localised_descriptions.F: Contracte les muscles pour augmenter la DEFENSE.
localised_descriptions.I: I muscoli si tonificano per aumentare la DIFESA.
localised_descriptions.S: Tensa la musculatura para aumentar la DEFENSA.

localised_descriptions.D: Anwender schrumpft, um Fluchtwert zu erhöhen.
localised_descriptions.E: Minimizes the user’s size to raise evasiveness.
localised_descriptions.F: Rapetisse le lanceur pour augmenter l’esquive.
localised_descriptions.I: Chi la usa si rimpicciolisce aumentando l’elusione.
localised_descriptions.S: El agresor mengua para aumentar la EVASIÓN.

localised_descriptions.D: Senkt Genauigkeit d. Geg-ners mit Rauch, Tinte o. ä.
localised_descriptions.E: Lowers the foe’s accuracy using smoke, ink, etc.
localised_descriptions.F: Baisse la précision ennemie utilisant fumée, encre, etc.
localised_descriptions.I: Fumo o inchiostro riducono la precisione del nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Baja la PRECISIÓN del enemigo con humo, etc.

localised_descriptions.D: Ein fieser Strahl, der den Gegner verwirrt.
localised_descriptions.E: A sinister ray that confuses the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Un horrible rayon qui rend l’ennemi confus.
localised_descriptions.I: Un raggio sinistro che confonde il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Rayo siniestro que confunde al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Rückzug in den harten Panzer. Erhöht VERT.-Wert.
localised_descriptions.E: Withdraws the body into its hard shell to raise DEFENSE.
localised_descriptions.F: Se recroqueville dans sa carapace. Monte la DEFENSE.
localised_descriptions.I: Il corpo si ritira nel guscio per aumentare la DIFESA.
localised_descriptions.S: El agresor se protege en su coraza y sube la DEFENSA.

localised_descriptions.D: Verbirgt Schwächen per Ein-rollen, VERT.-Wert steigt.
localised_descriptions.E: Curls up to conceal weak spots and raise DEFENSE.
localised_descriptions.F: S’enroule, cache ses points faibles. Monte la DEFENSE.
localised_descriptions.I: Raggomitolandosi, chi la usa aumenta la propria DIFESA.
localised_descriptions.S: Oculta su punto débil al rizarse. Sube la DEFENSA.

localised_descriptions.D: Erzeugt Barriere, die den VERT.-Wert stark erhöht.
localised_descriptions.E: Creates a barrier that sharply raises DEFENSE.
localised_descriptions.F: Crée une barrière pour booster la DEFENSE.
localised_descriptions.I: Una barriera aumenta di molto la DIFESA.
localised_descriptions.S: Crea una barrera para subir mucho la DEFENSA.

localised_descriptions.D: Erzeugt Lichtwand u. senkt SPEZ. ANGR.-Schaden.
localised_descriptions.E: Creates a wall of light that lowers SP. ATK damage.
localised_descriptions.F: Crée un mur lumineux et réduit les dégâts d’ATQ. SP.
localised_descriptions.I: Una barriera di luce riduce i danni dell’ATT. SP.
localised_descriptions.S: Reduce el daño que causa el AT. ESP. del rival.

localised_descriptions.D: Erzeugt dunklen Dunst. Löscht alle Statusänder.
localised_descriptions.E: Creates a black haze that eliminates all stat changes.
localised_descriptions.F: Crée un nuage noir annulant tout changement d’état.
localised_descriptions.I: Una cupa nube annulla ogni modifica delle statistiche.
localised_descriptions.S: Nube negra que elimina los cambios de caracterís.

localised_descriptions.D: Erzeugt Lichtwand, schützt teilweise vor phys. Angr.
localised_descriptions.E: Creates a wall of light that weakens physical attacks.
localised_descriptions.F: Crée un mur lumineux. Affaiblit att. physiques.
localised_descriptions.I: Una parete di luce indebo-  lisce gli attacchi fisici.
localised_descriptions.S: Pared de luz que debilita los ataques físicos.

localised_descriptions.D: Bündelt Kraft. Volltreffer-chance wird erhöht.
localised_descriptions.E: Focuses power to raise the critical-hit ratio.
localised_descriptions.F: Concentration permettant un taux de critiques élevé.
localised_descriptions.I: Concentrazione energetica: brutti colpi più probabili.
localised_descriptions.S: Concentra energía para asegurar un golpe crítico.

localised_descriptions.D: Erträgt 2 Runden Angriffe, schlägt doppelt zurück.
localised_descriptions.E: Endures attack for 2 turns to retaliate double.
localised_descriptions.F: Encaisse les attaques sur 2 tours et renvoie le double.
localised_descriptions.I: Subisce per 2 turni, per poi restituire il danno X 2.
localised_descriptions.S: Espera 2 turnos para atacar con doble potencia.

localised_descriptions.D: Bewegt Finger und wählt PKMN-Attacke zufällig aus.
localised_descriptions.E: Waggles a finger to use any POKéMON move at random.
localised_descriptions.F: Remue un doigt et lance une attaque POKéMON au hasard.
localised_descriptions.I: Un dito oscilla per usare una mossa POKéMON a caso.
localised_descriptions.S: Usa al azar un ataque POKéMON.

localised_descriptions.D: Erwidert gegn. Angriff mit derselben Attacke.
localised_descriptions.E: Counters the foe’s attack with the same move.
localised_descriptions.F: Contre l’attaque de l’ennemi avec la même attaque.
localised_descriptions.I: Risponde ad un attacco con la stessa mossa.
localised_descriptions.S: Contraataca con el mismo movimiento.

localised_descriptions.D: Richtet großen Schaden an. Anwender wird besiegt.
localised_descriptions.E: Inflicts severe damage but makes the user faint.
localised_descriptions.F: Inflige de sérieux dégâts, mais met le lanceur K.O.
localised_descriptions.I: Infligge un forte danno, ma chi la usa va KO.
localised_descriptions.S: Potente, pero hace que te debilites.

localised_descriptions.D: Ein Ei wird auf den Gegner abgefeuert.
localised_descriptions.E: An egg is forcibly hurled at the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Envoie violemment un œuf en direction de l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Un uovo scaraventato contro il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Arroja un huevo al enemigo.

localised_descriptions.D: Leck-Attacke mit Zunge. Gegner evtl. paralysiert.
localised_descriptions.E: Licks with a long tongue to injure. May also paralyze.
localised_descriptions.F: Blesse avec un long coup de langue. Peut paralyser.
localised_descriptions.I: Una lunga lingua infligge danni e può paralizzare.
localised_descriptions.S: Usa la lengua para atacar. Puede causar parálisis.

localised_descriptions.D: Angriff mit Gas. Gegner wird evtl. vergiftet.
localised_descriptions.E: An exhaust-gas attack that may also poison.
localised_descriptions.F: Un gaz nocif pouvant empoisonner l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Gas di scarico che può anche avvelenare.
localised_descriptions.S: Gases de escape que pueden llegar a envenenar.

localised_descriptions.D: Wirft Schlamm auf Gegner. Evtl. Vergiftung.
localised_descriptions.E: Sludge is hurled to inflict damage. May also poison.
localised_descriptions.F: Blesse en envoyant des détritus. Peut empoisonner.
localised_descriptions.I: Lancio di fango che arreca danno e può avvelenare.
localised_descriptions.S: Arroja residuos al rival. Puede llegar a envenenar.

localised_descriptions.D: Schlägt Gegner mit Keule und verschreckt ihn evtl.
localised_descriptions.E: Clubs the foe with a bone. May cause flinching.
localised_descriptions.F: Cogne l’ennemi avec un os. Peut apeurer.
localised_descriptions.I: Un osso colpisce il nemico e può farlo tentennare.
localised_descriptions.S: Aporrea con un hueso. Puede causar retroceso.

localised_descriptions.D: Feuersbrunst, die alles ver-sengt. Verbrennt Geg. evtl.
localised_descriptions.E: Incinerates everything it strikes. May cause a burn.
localised_descriptions.F: Carbonise ce qui est touché. Peut brûler l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Un’esplosione fa terra bruciata: può scottare.
localised_descriptions.S: Llama que lo chamusca todo y suele causar quemadura.

localised_descriptions.D: Attacke basiert auf Tempo. Erklimmt Wasserfälle.
localised_descriptions.E: Charges the foe with speed to climb waterfalls.
localised_descriptions.F: Charge rapide permettant de franchir des cascades.
localised_descriptions.I: Carica il nemico con la for-za di chi risale cascate.
localised_descriptions.S: Embiste con impulso para remontar una cascada.

localised_descriptions.D: Fängt und drückt Gegner für 2-5 Runden.
localised_descriptions.E: Traps and squeezes the foe for 2 to 5 turns.
localised_descriptions.F: Piège l’ennemi et l’écrase pendant 2 à 5 tours.
localised_descriptions.I: Intrappola e stringe il nemico da 2 a 5 turni.
localised_descriptions.S: Atrapa y atenaza con fuerza de 2 a 5 turnos.

localised_descriptions.D: Verschießt sternförmige Strahlen. Treffergarantie!
localised_descriptions.E: Sprays star-shaped rays that never miss.
localised_descriptions.F: Envoie des rayons en forme d’étoile. Touche toujours.
localised_descriptions.I: Raggi a forma di stella: infallibili.
localised_descriptions.S: Lanza rayos en forma de estrella que no fallan.

localised_descriptions.D: Zieht Kopf ein und greift in der nächsten Runde an.
localised_descriptions.E: Tucks in the head, then attacks on the next turn.
localised_descriptions.F: Rentre la tête et attaque au tour suivant.
localised_descriptions.I: Abbassa la testa per attaccare dopo un turno.
localised_descriptions.S: 1.ᵉ turno: se prepara. 2.º: da el cabezazo.

localised_descriptions.D: Verschießt spitze Stacheln und trifft 2 - 5-mal.
localised_descriptions.E: Launches sharp spikes that strike 2 to 5 times.
localised_descriptions.F: Lance des pointes qui frappent 2 à 5 fois.
localised_descriptions.I: Lance acuminate colpiscono il nemico da 2 a 5 volte.
localised_descriptions.S: Lanza finas púas que hieren de 2 a 5 veces.

localised_descriptions.D: Schmerzvoller Klammergriff. Senkt evtl. INIT.-Wert.
localised_descriptions.E: Constricts to inflict pain. May lower SPEED.
localised_descriptions.F: Etrangle pour blesser. Peut baisser la VITESSE.
localised_descriptions.I: Impedimento che danneggia e può ridurre la VELOCITÀ.
localised_descriptions.S: Constriñe para herir y puede bajar la VELOCIDAD.

localised_descriptions.D: Gedächtnisverlust, der SPEZ. VERT. deutlich erhöht.
localised_descriptions.E: Forgets about something and sharply raises SP. DEF.
localised_descriptions.F: Oublie quelque chose et booste la DEF. SPE.
localised_descriptions.I: Vuoto di memoria che aumenta la DIF. SP.
localised_descriptions.S: Olvida algo y aumenta mucho la DEFENSA ESP.

localised_descriptions.D: Lenkt Gegner ab und senkt evtl. seine Genauigkeit.
localised_descriptions.E: Distracts the foe. May lower accuracy.
localised_descriptions.F: Distrait l’ennemi. Peut baisser la précision.
localised_descriptions.I: Distrae il nemico e può ridurne la precisione.
localised_descriptions.S: Distrae al rival y baja su nivel de PRECISIÓN.

localised_descriptions.D: Max. KP des Anwenders w. bis zur Hälfte aufgefüllt.
localised_descriptions.E: Recovers up to half the user’s maximum HP.
localised_descriptions.F: Regagne jusqu’à la moitié des PV max du lanceur.
localised_descriptions.I: Chi la usa recupera fino a metà dei PS massimi.
localised_descriptions.S: Restaura hasta la mitad de tus PS máximos.

localised_descriptions.D: Sprung-Tritt mit Knie. Miss-erfolg verletzt Anwender.
localised_descriptions.E: A jumping knee kick. If it misses, the user is hurt.
localised_descriptions.F: Coup de pied sauté. S’il est raté, le lanceur se blesse.
localised_descriptions.I: Ginocchiata: chi la fa subisce danni se fallisce.
localised_descriptions.S: Si fallas esta patada, puedes autolesionarte.

localised_descriptions.D: Schüchtert Gegner ein, so dass er paralysiert ist.
localised_descriptions.E: Intimidates and frightens the foe into paralysis.
localised_descriptions.F: Intimide l’ennemi et le paralyse de terreur.
localised_descriptions.I: Il nemico è così spaventato da paralizzarsi.
localised_descriptions.S: Intimida y asusta al rival hasta dejarlo paralizado.

localised_descriptions.D: Schlafendem Gegner wird halber Schaden abgezogen.
localised_descriptions.E: Takes one half the damage inflicted on a sleeping foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Aspire la moitié des dégâts infligés à l’ennemi endormi.
localised_descriptions.I: Assorbe metà dei PS persi da un nemico addormentato.
localised_descriptions.S: Roba la mitad del daño causado a un rival dormido.

localised_descriptions.D: Hüllt Gegner in giftiges Gas ein, kann vergiften.
localised_descriptions.E: Envelops the foe in a toxic gas that may poison.
localised_descriptions.F: Enveloppe l’ennemi d’un gaz toxique. Peut empoisonner.
localised_descriptions.I: Il nemico è avvolto in un gas che può avvelenare.
localised_descriptions.S: Envuelve al enemigo en gas tóxico y venenoso.

localised_descriptions.D: Wirft 2 - 5-mal runde Gegen-stände auf den Gegner.
localised_descriptions.E: Hurls round objects at the foe 2 to 5 times.
localised_descriptions.F: Projette 2 à 5 fois des  objets vers l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Lancio di sfere sul nemico da 2 a 5 volte.
localised_descriptions.S: Arroja esferas al rival de 2 a 5 veces.

localised_descriptions.D: Ein Angriff, der die Hälfte des Schadens absaugt.
localised_descriptions.E: An attack that steals half the damage inflicted.
localised_descriptions.F: Une attaque qui aspire la moitié des dégâts infligés.
localised_descriptions.I: Sottrae PS al nemico pari a metà del danno infertogli.
localised_descriptions.S: Absorbe la mitad del daño producido.

localised_descriptions.D: Fordert Kuss mit bösem Blick. Evtl. Schlaf.
localised_descriptions.E: Demands a kiss with a scary face that induces sleep.
localised_descriptions.F: Demande un bisou en grimaçant. Peut endormir.
localised_descriptions.I: Un bacio rubato che può costringere al sonno.
localised_descriptions.J: YセくくYセくたYセくねYセくみYセくりYセくぃYセくぎYセくぞYセくぶYセくっYセくクYセくタYセくネYセくミYセくリYセくィYセくギYセくゾYセくブYセくッYセく7YセくRムeく ぬぇユぇユぇユ:Xセく Yセく    たÜろくだム くすすせせすすそせすそすせそすせせそすすせせそす    ぞ え
localised_descriptions.S: Pide un beso con una cara que asusta y adormece.

localised_descriptions.D: Sucht nach Schwächen, Treffer nächste Runde.
localised_descriptions.E: Searches out weak spots, then strikes the next turn.
localised_descriptions.F: Cherche les points faibles et frappe au tour suivant.
localised_descriptions.I: Trova punti deboli, per at-taccare al turno seguente.
localised_descriptions.S: 1.º: busca punto flaco. 2.º: va a por él.

localised_descriptions.D: Ändert die Anwenderzellen für ein Ebenbild d. Gegners.
localised_descriptions.E: Alters the user’s cells to become a copy of the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Modifie ses cellules pour copier l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Chi la usa si trasforma in una copia del nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Modifica las células del rival y lo clona.

localised_descriptions.D: Angriff mit Blasen. INIT.-Wert wird evtl. gesenkt.
localised_descriptions.E: An attack using bubbles. May lower the foe’s SPEED.
localised_descriptions.F: Une attaque de bulles pouvant baisser la VITESSE.
localised_descriptions.I: Bolle che possono ridurre la VELOCITÀ del nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Usa burbujas para intentar bajar la VELOCIDAD.

localised_descriptions.D: Rhythmischer Schlag, der den Gegner verwirren kann.
localised_descriptions.E: A rhythmic punch that may confuse the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Un coup de poing cadencé. Peut rendre confus.
localised_descriptions.I: Pugno ritmico che può confondere il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Puño repetitivo que puede causar confusión.

localised_descriptions.D: Erzeugt eine Wolke aus ein-schläfernden Sporen.
localised_descriptions.E: Scatters a cloud of spores that always induce sleep.
localised_descriptions.F: Répand un nuage de spores qui endort à tous les coups.
localised_descriptions.I: Nube di spore che fa sempre addormentare il nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Esparce esporas que inducen al sueño.

localised_descriptions.D: Erzeugt helles Licht, das gegn. Genauigkeit senkt.
localised_descriptions.E: Looses a powerful blast of light that cuts accuracy.
localised_descriptions.F: Explosion lumineuse qui fait baisser la précision.
localised_descriptions.I: Violento abbaglio che abbatte la precisione.
localised_descriptions.S: Ciega con un fogonazo de luz y baja la PRECISIÓN.

localised_descriptions.D: Psycho-Welle mit unter-schiedlicher Intensität.
localised_descriptions.E: Attacks with a psychic wave of varying intensity.
localised_descriptions.F: Envoie une onde PSY d’intensité variable.
localised_descriptions.I: Onda psichica di intensità variabile.
localised_descriptions.S: Ataque con onda psíquica de intensidad variable.

localised_descriptions.D: Nur ein Platscher..., der überhaupt nichts bewirkt.
localised_descriptions.E: It’s just a splash... Has no effect whatsoever.
localised_descriptions.F: Eclabousse l’ennemi... N’a aucun effet.
localised_descriptions.I: Semplice spruzzo, privo di qualsiasi efficacia.
localised_descriptions.S: No tiene ningún efecto. Sólo salpica.

localised_descriptions.D: Verflüssigt Körper d. An-wenders. Erhöht VERT.
localised_descriptions.E: Liquifies the user’s body to sharply raise DEFENSE.
localised_descriptions.F: Liquéfie le corps du lanceur et booste sa DEFENSE.
localised_descriptions.I: Chi la usa diventa liquido: sale di molto la DIFESA.
localised_descriptions.S: Te hace líquido y aumenta bastante tu DEFENSA.

localised_descriptions.D: Schlägt mit Schere zu. Volltrefferchance hoch.
localised_descriptions.E: Hammers with a pincer. Has a high critical-hit ratio.
localised_descriptions.F: Cogne avec une pince. Taux de critiques élevé.
localised_descriptions.I: Sferzata con tenaglie. Probabile brutto colpo.
localised_descriptions.S: Pinza con fuerza y suele dar un golpe crítico.

localised_descriptions.D: Richtet großen Schaden an. Anwender wird besiegt.
localised_descriptions.E: Inflicts severe damage but makes the user faint.
localised_descriptions.F: Inflige de sérieux dégâts, mais met le lanceur K.O.
localised_descriptions.I: Infligge un forte danno, ma chi la usa va KO.
localised_descriptions.S: Causa mucho daño, pero te debilita.

localised_descriptions.D: Beharkt Gegner 2 - 5-mal mit scharfen Klauen o. ä.
localised_descriptions.E: Rakes the foe with sharp claws, etc., 2 to 5 times.
localised_descriptions.F: Ecorche l’ennemi avec des griffes, etc., de 2 à 5 fois.
localised_descriptions.I: Tormenta con tenaglie e simili da 2 a 5 volte.
localised_descriptions.S: Araña rápidamente de 2 a 5 veces.

localised_descriptions.D: Ein Bumerang aus Knochen, der zweimal trifft.
localised_descriptions.E: Throws a bone boomerang that strikes twice.
localised_descriptions.F: Lance un boomerang en os qui frappe deux fois.
localised_descriptions.I: Boomerang d’osso che colpisce 2 volte.
localised_descriptions.S: Lanza un hueso a modo de bumerán, que da 2 veces.

localised_descriptions.D: Anwender schläft 2 Runden, KP und Status erneuert.
localised_descriptions.E: The user sleeps for 2 turns, restoring HP and status.
localised_descriptions.F: Le lanceur dort 2 tours et regagne PV et statut.
localised_descriptions.I: Chi la usa dorme per 2 turni e recupera PS e stato.
localised_descriptions.S: Te duerme durante 2 turnos para curarte totalmente.

localised_descriptions.D: Schleudert riesige Felsen. Verschreckt evtl. Gegner.
localised_descriptions.E: Large boulders are hurled. May cause flinching.
localised_descriptions.F: Envoie de gros rochers. Peut apeurer l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Grandi massi lanciati sul nemico, che può tentennare.
localised_descriptions.S: Lanza grandes pedruscos. Puede causar retroceso.

localised_descriptions.D: Angriff mit Zähnen. Verschreckt evtl. Gegner.
localised_descriptions.E: Attacks with sharp fangs. May cause flinching.
localised_descriptions.F: Blesse d’un coup de croc. Peut apeurer l’ennemi.
localised_descriptions.I: Attacco con denti affilati, che può far tentennare.
localised_descriptions.S: Ataque con finos colmillos. Puede causar retroceso.

localised_descriptions.D: Reduziert Polygonzahl und erhöht ANGR.-Wert.
localised_descriptions.E: Reduces the polygon count and raises ATTACK.
localised_descriptions.F: Réduit les polygones et augmente l’ATTAQUE.
localised_descriptions.I: Riduce i poligoni per aumentare l’ATTACCO.
localised_descriptions.S: Mejora el ATAQUE de quien lo usa.

localised_descriptions.D: Wandelt Typ d. Anwenders in bekannten Attacken-Typ.
localised_descriptions.E: Changes the user’s type into a known move’s type.
localised_descriptions.F: Change le type du lanceur en celui d’une cap. connue.
localised_descriptions.I: Il tipo di chi la usa muta in quello di una sua mossa.
localised_descriptions.S: Cambia tu tipo por el tipo de un ataque conocido.

localised_descriptions.D: Feuert 3 Arten von Strahlen gleichzeitig ab.
localised_descriptions.E: Fires three types of beams at the same time.
localised_descriptions.F: Envoie trois types de rayons en même temps.
localised_descriptions.I: Spara raggi di tre diversi tipi contemporaneamente.
localised_descriptions.S: Dispara 3 tipos de rayos a la vez.

localised_descriptions.D: Greift mit scharfen Zähnen an. Halbiert gegnerische KP.
localised_descriptions.E: Attacks with sharp fangs and cuts half the foe’s HP.
localised_descriptions.F: Coup de croc qui fait baisser les PV de moitié.
localised_descriptions.I: Denti affilati abbattono metà dei PS del nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Finos colmillos que bajan a la mitad los PS del rival.

localised_descriptions.D: Hieb mit Klauen o. ä. Hohe Volltrefferquote.
localised_descriptions.E: Slashes with claws, etc. Has a high critical-hit ratio.
localised_descriptions.F: Coups de griffe, etc. Taux de critiques élevé.
localised_descriptions.I: Attacco di artigli e simili: probabile brutto colpo.
localised_descriptions.S: Acuchilla con pinzas, etc. Suele dar un golpe crítico.

localised_descriptions.D: Lockvogel, der 1/4 der max. KP des Anwenders besitzt.
localised_descriptions.E: Creates a decoy using 1/4 of the user’s maximum HP.
localised_descriptions.F: Crée un leurre avec 1/4 des PV max du lanceur.
localised_descriptions.I: Crea un’esca con 1/4 dei PS massimi di chi la usa.
localised_descriptions.S: Crea un señuelo con 1/4 de tus PS máximos.

localised_descriptions.D: Einsatz nur bei verbrauch-ten AP. Selbstschädigung!
localised_descriptions.E: Used only if all PP are gone. Also hurts the user a little.
localised_descriptions.F: Fonctionne s’il ne reste plus de PP. Blesse un peu.
localised_descriptions.I: Agisce solo a PP azzerati e danneggia anche chi la usa.
localised_descriptions.S: Sólo se usa al acabarse los PP. Te hiere un poco.

localised_descriptions.D: Kopiert stets den zuletzt erlittenen Angriff.
localised_descriptions.E: Copies the foe’s last move permanently.
localised_descriptions.F: Copie en permanence la dernière attaque ennemie.
localised_descriptions.I: Copia per sempre l’ultima mossa usata dal nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Copia siempre el último ataque del rival.

localised_descriptions.D: Tritt Gegner 3-mal nach-einander. Härte nimmt zu.
localised_descriptions.E: Kicks the foe 3 times in a row with rising intensity.
localised_descriptions.F: Trois coups de pied de plus en plus puissants.
localised_descriptions.I: Tre calci consecutivi, sempre più forti.
localised_descriptions.S: Patea 3 veces seguidas y cada vez más fuerte.

localised_descriptions.D: Kann das vom Gegner gehaltene Item stehlen.
localised_descriptions.E: While attacking, it may steal the foe’s held item.
localised_descriptions.F: Peut voler l’objet tenu par l’ennemi pendant l’attaque.
localised_descriptions.I: Può rubare lo strumento tenuto dal nemico.
localised_descriptions.S: Puede quitarle al rival el objeto que lleve.

localised_descriptions.D: Wickelt Gegner ein. Flucht  oder Tausch unmöglich.
localised_descriptions.E: Ensnares the foe to stop it from fleeing or switching.
localised_descriptions.F: Capture l’ennemi et empêche toute fuite ou changement.
localised_descriptions.I: Il nemico non può fuggire né essere sostituito.
localised_descriptions.S: Enreda al rival para evitar que huya o pida el relevo.

localised_descriptions.D: Ahnt gegnerische Aktion. Nächste Attacke trifft.
localised_descriptions.E: Senses the foe’s action to ensure the next move’s hit.
localised_descriptions.F: Pressent l’action pour réussir l’attaque suivante.
localised_descriptions.I: Studia il nemico: la prossima mossa andrà a segno.
localised_descriptions.S: Adivina el ataque del otro y actúa en consecuencia.

localised_descriptions.D: Bewirkt 1/4 Schaden pro Zug bei schlafendem Gegner.
localised_descriptions.E: Inflicts 1/4 damage on a sleeping foe every turn.
localised_descriptions.F: Inflige 1/4 de dégâts à un ennemi endormi chaque tour.
localised_descriptions.I: Il nemico addormentato perde 1/4 dei PS ogni turno.
localised_descriptions.J: えぃユ.ヲeくぃユ  ぃユぃユでZセくピZセく    たÜろくだム く ぞ ぞ し
localised_descriptions.S: El rival dormido pierde 1/4 de PS por turno.

localised_descriptions.D: Benutzer wird nass, so dass er Feuer besser standhält.
localised_descriptions.E: The user becomes soaked to raise resistance to fire.
localised_descriptions.F: Mouille le lanceur et aug-mente sa résistance au feu.
localised_descriptions.I: Chi la usa s’impregna d’ac-qua per resistere al fuoco.
localised_descriptions.S: Te moja para que resistas más los ataques de fuego.

localised_descriptions.D: Erhöht SPEZ. ANGR. u. SPEZ. VERT. durch Konzentration.
localised_descriptions.E: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.
localised_descriptions.F: Méditation pour augmenter l’ATQ. SPE. et la DEF. SPE.
localised_descriptions.I: Concentrazione: aumentano l’ATT. SP. e la DIF. SP.
localised_descriptions.J: ゃみなちざみにたく
localised_descriptions.S: Sube el AT. ESP. y la DEF. ESP. con concentración.

localised_descriptions.D: Hieb mit scharfkantigem Blatt. Hohe Volltrefferqu.
localised_descriptions.E: Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical-hit ratio.
localised_descriptions.F: Tranche avec une feuille. Taux de critiques élevé.
localised_descriptions.I: Foglia affilata. Probabile brutto colpo.
localised_descriptions.S: Acuchilla con una hoja fina. Suele dar un golpe crítico.

localised_descriptions.D: Ein mystischer Tanz, der ANGR.- u. INIT.-Wert erhöht.
localised_descriptions.E: A mystical dance that ups ATTACK and SPEED.
localised_descriptions.F: Danse mystique augmentant l’ATTAQUE et la VITESSE.
localised_descriptions.I: Danza magica che aumenta l’ATTACCO e la VELOCITÀ.
localised_descriptions.J: モlづUむ・ヂヂ
localised_descriptions.S: Danza mística que sube el ATAQUE y la VELOCIDAD.

localised_descriptions.D: Wirft 2 - 5-mal in Folge Felsblöcke auf den Gegner.
localised_descriptions.E: Hurls boulders at the foe 2 to 5 times in a row.
localised_descriptions.F: Projette des rochers sur l’ennemi 2 à 5 fois de suite.
localised_descriptions.I: Lancio di massi sul nemico che dura da 2 a 5 volte.
localised_descriptions.S: Lanza pedruscos al rival de 2 a 5 veces consecutivas.

localised_descriptions.D: Schnelle Elektro-Attacke mit Treffergarantie.
localised_descriptions.E: A fast and unavoidable electric attack.
localised_descriptions.F: Attaque électrique rapide et impossible à esquiver.
localised_descriptions.I: Rapido ed inevitabile attacco elettrico.
localised_descriptions.S: Ataque eléctrico muy rápido e ineludible.

localised_descriptions.D: Ultraschallwellen, die den Gegner verwirren können.
localised_descriptions.E: Attacks with ultrasonic waves. May confuse the foe.
localised_descriptions.F: Envoi d’ondes aquatiques. Peut rendre confus.
localised_descriptions.I: Onde ultrasoniche: possono confondere il nemico.
localised_descriptions.J: bゥみ
localised_descriptions.S: Ondas ultrasónicas que pueden confundir al rival.

localised_descriptions.D: Speichert Sonnenenergie. Angriff 2 Runden später.
localised_descriptions.E: Summons strong sunlight to attack 2 turns later.
localised_descriptions.F: Récupère la lumière pour frapper 2 tours plus tard.
localised_descriptions.I: Forte luce solare che colpisce dopo 2 turni.
localised_descriptions.S: Concentra intensa luz solar y ataca 2 turnos después.

localised_descriptions.D: Angriff mit voller Kraft. SPEZ. ANGR. sinkt deutlich.
localised_descriptions.E: Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.
localised_descriptions.F: Attaque à pleine puissance, mais baisse ATQ. SPE.
localised_descriptions.I: Potente attacco, ma riduce di molto l’ATT. SP.
localised_descriptions.J: ⬆ーダュ かオあ
localised_descriptions.S: Es tremendamente potente, pero baja mucho el AT. ESP.
